name: Baked Salmon Croquettes
author: Shifrah
summary: A tastier salmon patty that is easy to make and fun to eat, especially as part of a brunch.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can salmon, drained and bones removed
2 cups cornflake crumbs, or more as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Add minced onion; cook and stir until translucent, 3 to 5 minutes
Stir in flour and salt until combined
Add milk and stir until mixture is thickened, 2 to 3 minutes
Add salmon, 1 cup cornflake crumbs, and lemon juice
Form mixture into crescents, pyramids, or any other shape you like
Roll patties in the remaining cornflake crumbs to coat
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes
